participant_1.background:
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.
i can benchpress 345 pounds.
I bought my first guitar when I was 14 years old.
I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime.
I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth.

participant_2.background:
My family was the first to accept me for who I am, with my curly hair and snake.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.
i like to bike.
i own a mansion that i do not live in.
i am a retired school teacher.

content.text: Hey there.
Hello! How are you doing this evening?
I'm doing well! I'm just relaxing at home after a long day at work. How about you?
I'm doing well too! I just got back from a bike ride.
That sounds fun! I love biking, but I don't get to do it very often.
It's my favorite way to get around. I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
I bet! I wish I could bike to work, but it's too far.
Maybe you could start biking to work on the weekends? It's a great way to get some exercise.
That's a great idea! I'll try that out.
I'm sure you'll love it!
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a web developer.
Oh, that's cool! I've always been interested in web development.
It's a lot of fun! I get to create websites and apps.
That sounds like a really creative job.
It is! I love being able to come up with new ideas and bring them to life.
That's awesome! So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
I love being able to use my creativity to solve problems and make people's lives easier.
That's a great answer! I'm sure you're a great web developer.
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you have a really great job.
I do! I'm really lucky
